original_text: For we know that since Christ was raised from the dead, he cannot die again; death no longer has mastery over him.
korean_text: 이는 그리스도께서 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나셨으매 다시 죽지 아니하시고 사망이 다시 그를 주장하지 못할 줄을 앎이로라

sentences.original_text: that since Christ was raised from the dead
death no longer has mastery over him
sentences.korean_translation: 사망이 그를 더 이상 지배하지 못한다
